titleStmt.title: The parallel, or, The new specious association an old rebellious covenant closing with a disparity between a true patriot and a factious associator.
titleStmt.author: Northleigh, John, 1657-1705.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for B. Tooke ... and T. Sawbridge ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by John Northleigh. Cf. BM.
